types:type.name: register-covid-case-meta-data
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type register_covid_case_meta_data = {| source: String, caseType: String, firstName: String, lastName: String, phone: String, email: String, dateOfBirth: String, nationalID: String, nationalIDType: String, address: {| streetAddress: String, city: String, state: String, postal: String, country: String |} |} {"example": "{\\\"source\\\":\\\"Hospital1\\\",\\\"caseType\\\":\\\"positive\\\",\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"John\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"Nixon\\\",\\\"phone\\\":\\\"541-754-3010\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"john@gmail.com\\\",\\\"dateOfBirth\\\":\\\"1989-04-26\\\",\\\"nationalID\\\":\\\"209-49-6193\\\",\\\"nationalIDType\\\":\\\"SSN\\\",\\\"address\\\":{\\\"streetAddress\\\":\\\"1600 Pennsylvania Avenue NW\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"Dallas\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"TX\\\",\\\"postal\\\":\\\"20500\\\",\\\"country\\\":\\\"USA\\\"}}"}

types:type.name: update-covid-case-sample-json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type update_covid_case_sample_json = {| street_address: String, country: String, city: String, date_of_birth: String, case_type: String, last_name: String, source: String, national_id_type: String, phone: String, national_id: String, case_id: String, state: String, postal: String, first_name: String, email: String |} {"example": "{\\\"street_address\\\":\\\"1600 Pennsylvania Avenue NW\\\",\\\"country\\\":\\\"USA\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"Washington\\\",\\\"date_of_birth\\\":\\\"1989-04-26\\\",\\\"case_type\\\":\\\"Ghani\\\",\\\"last_name\\\":\\\"Nixon\\\",\\\"source\\\":\\\"Ghani\\\",\\\"national_id_type\\\":\\\"SSN\\\",\\\"phone\\\":\\\"541-754-3012\\\",\\\"national_id\\\":\\\"209-49-6193\\\",\\\"case_id\\\":\\\"7\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"DC\\\",\\\"postal\\\":\\\"20500\\\",\\\"first_name\\\":\\\"John\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"john@gmail.com\\\"}"}
